v jizni casti vrchu opolenec byly koncem roku 1879 pri lamani vapence odkryty dve pukliny pravdepodobne zbytky rozsahlejsi jeskyne v blizkosti volynky zaplnene vapencovou suti a porezni hlinou s piscitou primesi obsahujici bohaty paleontologicky material jnwoldrich 188083 nalezl v jeskynnich hlinach bohaty osteologicky material mladopleistocenni a holocenni fauny celkem asi 9000 kosti a 13000 zubu nalezejicich 70 zvirecim druhum dnes nachazime v lomu u sudslavic pouhe torzo jeskyne lokalita je velmi zajimava nebot vedle vyznamu geologickeho ma take vyznam paleontologicky a botanicky lezi tesne vedle zeleznicni trati asi 400 m severovychodne od sudslavic lokalita je soucasti naucne stezky sudslavicky okruh ktera byla vybudovana v r 1985 na uzemi prirodni rezervace opolenec v delce asi 200 m je tu podle zeleznicni trati odkryta mohutne skalni defile 3040 m vysoke cast byla odtezena pri stavbe trati take zde byl lom nebo skupina lomu ale cast skalni steny je prirodni priblizne v polovine defile je obnazeno torzo jeskyne ktera prochazi skalnim ostrohem ktery tu zbyl po tezbe vapence jeji zbytek je asi 10 m dlouhy a 5 az 7 m vysoky v jeskyni je vapenec selektivne zkrasovately pricemz vostinovite pozitivne vyvetravaji polohy ktere jsou bohatsi silikatovymi mineraly na lokalite dominuje lavicovite odlucny svetle sedy drobne zrnity paskovany krystalicky vapenec s primesemi silikatovych mineralu misty jsou v nem intruze a zily drobne zrniteho biotitickeho granitu nebo zily svetleho pegmatitu jeskyne je jednim z pozustatku nekolika krasovych jevu kopce opolenec ktere byly z vetsiny zniceny nebo silne poskozeny tezbou krystalickeho vapence ten tvori valnou cast vrchu a byl zde ulozen jako cocka v rule o delce 500m a mocnosti 10 az 20 metru krystalicky vapenec mramor je hornina ktera obsahuje vice nez 95 kalcitu jako dalsi slozky se mohou objevovat pigmenty primesi nerosty jilove hmoty nebo organicke latky ktere puvodni bily mramor rozmanite zbarvuji muze byt bily barevny tmave sedy az cerny nejcastejsimi puvodci zbarveni jsou oxidy nebo hydroxidy zelezacervene limonit zlute chlorit zelene a grafit sede az cerne odstinyv sirsim slova smyslu se slovem mramor oznacuje kazdy vapenec ktery se da lestit mramor vznika premenou metamorfozou vapencu vlivem vysokeho tlaku a teploty v zemske kure doslo k prekrystalovani kalcitu puvodni horniny vetsinou organogenniho vapence proto v mramoru nenajdeme schranky zivocichu nebo rostlin nad jeskyni se vypina do vysky asi 15 m mohutny skalni masiv zpristupneny navstevnikum pomoci zeleznych zebriku zabudovanych do skaly ve stene lze spatrit zajimavy prirodni ukaz v hrubozrnne zule vykrystalizoval turmalin a vytvoril zde stebelnate shluky stebla se rozbihaji ze stredu a pripominaji paprsky slunce turmalinova slunce male tmave skvrny jsou videt i na balvanech pri prichodu stezky k jeskyni zdroj chabera s1959 posumavsky kras chabera s1976 krasove jeskyne v posumavi chabera s1982 geologicke zajimavosti jiznich cech naucna stezka cca 4km dlouha zacina i konci u sudslavicke lipy a jeskyne je zastaveni cislo 11 teren je velmi clenity a za mokra muze byt velmi zradny a misty az nebezpecny rozhodne nelze stezku doporucit osobam se ztizenou pohyblivosti pro uznani logu musite zodpovedet nasledujici otazky a odpovedi zaslat emailem skrze muj profil gogo cz a na informacni tabuli muzete videt kosterni ostatky a take kresbu jednoho velkeho zvire jakeho b pomoci gps zjistete nadmorskou vysku pred jeskyni c jaky je jiny nazev pro krystalicky vapenec viz listing d podle zbarveni zdejsiho krystalickeho vapence urcete jeho hlavni primes identifikacni klic hledejte v listingu e pokud byste chteli projit skrz jeskyni jaky smerem sv j z z naucne stezky byste se museli vydat f k logu prilozte foto u skaly s gps nebo s vami tento ukol je dobrovolny logovat muzete bez naseho potvrzeni budeli s vasimi odpovedmi neco v neporadku ozveme se dodrzujte prosim poradi nejdrive odpovedi potom log logy bez predchozicho zaslani odpovedi budou smazany in 1879 two fissures were exposed in the southern part of the opolenec hill probably remains of a larger cave near volynka while quarrying limestone the fissures were filled with limestone debris and porous dirt with the addition of sand and contained rich paleontological material jnwoldrich 188083 found rich osteological material of late pleistocene and holocene fauna in the cave dirt about 9000 bones and 13000 teeth of 70 animal species today we can find only a torso of the former cave in the quarry the locality is very interesting because of its geological and also paleontological and botanical importance its located right next to a railway about 400 meters southwest of sudslavice the locality is a part of sudlavice nature trail circuit which was built in 1985 in the opolenec nature reserve there are about 200 meters of exposed rock wall next to the railway about 30 40 meters high part of it was destroyed during the railway construction or quarried but it is partially natural the torso of the cave is exposed about in the middle of the wall it is about 10 meters long and 5 to 7 meters wide the cave is a remnant of one of several karst phenomena near the opolenec hill which were mostly destroyed or heavily damaged by the quarrying of the crystallized limestone the limestone comprises a major part of the hill and was deposited here in a form of lens about 500 meters long and 10 to 20 meters thick in the gneiss crystallized limestone marble is a metamorphic rock which contains more than 95 of calcite it can also contain clays various minerals graphitegray or black tone chloritegreen tone hematitered tone limoniteyellow tone etc and organic substances which are giving color to the originally white marble in a broad sense the word marble is used to brand any polishable limestone marble is created by a metamorphosis of limestone high pressures and temperatures in the earths crust recrystallized the calcite of the original rock mostly organogenous limestone thats why we cannot find remains of animals or plants in the marble there is a rock massive about 15 meters high above the cave accessible by iron ladders built in the rock you can spot an interesting geological phenomenon in the wall crystallized tourmaline in the granite the clusters of the tourmaline resemble sunrays you can also see the tourmaline suns small black spots on the boulders near the trail to the cave the nature trail about 4km long starts and ends at the linden in sudslavice and the cave is the stop number 11 the terrain is very rugged and can be quite dangerous during rain or when wet the trail is not passable by physically disabled or impaired persons the cache to claim this cache you must fulfil following tasks and send answers to my profile gogo cz a you can see skeletal remains and also a drawing of a big animal what animal is it b use your gps to measure the altitude in front of the cave c what is the term used for a crystallized limestone see the listing d determine the main admixture of the local crystallized limestone according its color the identification key you can find in the listing e if you wanted to go through the cave what cardinal direction n e s w would you have to go from the trail f append a photo of the rock with you or your gps device this task is optional you can log the cache without my confirmation but you should send me answers before the logging if there is anything wrong with your answers i will let you know logs without sending answers will be deleted you can also visit our another earthcaches here

pl kopalnia soli w bochni jest mniej znana niz jej sasiadka w wieliczce jest jednakze od niej starsza wydobycie rozpoczeto w niej juz w 1248 roku zwiedzanie zabytkowej czesci kopalni na poziomach iii wernier iv august i vi sienkiewicz dostarcza wielu okazji do zapoznania sie z geologia regionu oraz z historia i tradycjami gornictwa solnego w malopolsce zloze soli w bochni na podstawie z duda j hydzik kopalnia soli bochnia 2009 malopolskie zloza soli kamiennej powstaly okolo 135 miliona lat temu w mioceniewypietrzaniu sie karpat towarzyszylo utworzenie po ich polnocnej stronie rozleglego podluznego zapadliska ktore wypelnila woda bylo to tak zwane morze miocenskie w srodkowym miocenie zaistnialy warunki klimatyczne sprzyjajace parowaniu wody i wytracaniu sie soli kamiennych ruchy tektoniczne spowodowaly nastepnie przesuniecia skal i niszczenie czesci powstalych wczesniej pokladow soli kamiennej ktore zostaly rozbite na mniejsze fragmenty w postaci blokow o zroznicowanych wielkosciach material ten wraz z innymi skalami zostal nasuniety na wczesniej powstale poklady soli w formowaniu sie zloz mialy tez udzial wielkie podmorskie osuwiska czas tworzenia sie calego kompleksu skal solnych trwal okolo 20 tysiecy lat obszar zloza bochenskiego znajduje sie na granicy dwoch krain geograficznych kotliny sandomierskiej i karpat fliszowych rownoleznikowa rozciaglosc rozpoznanego zloza solnego wynosi ok 35 km maksymalna szerokosc wynosi 200 m glebokosc najnizszego xiii poziomu to 468 m a rozpoznanie wierceniami siega ok 520 m liczac od powierzchni terenu w przekrojach poziomych i pionowych zloze ma ksztalt zblizony do soczewki sol skupiona jest w polnocnym skrzydle antykliny bochenskiej i stanowi glowny element tektoniczny w okolicach bochni w kopalni bochnia znajduja sie trzy grupy pokladow soli poludniowa srodkowa i polnocna patrz schemat sole poludniowe jest to warstwa o miazszosci od 2 do 4 m przewaza czysta sol srednio i gruboziarnista nadajaca sie do spozycia wskutek zaburzen tektonicznych sole te tworza przy poludniowej granicy zloza wieksze skupienia sole srodkowe stanowia glowne bogactwo zloz bochenskich i wystepuja bezposrednio na lupku ilowoanhydrytowym sa to jadalne sole srednioziarniste szare z cienkimi przewarstwieniami soli bialej ktore tworza najbardziej charakterystyczna dla kopalni soli bochnia sol pasiasta miazszosc tej warstwy oceniona zostala na 812 m sole polnocne wystepuja nad ilowcem anhydrytowym zlozone sa z zespolu cienszych warstw solnych i naprzemianleglych warstw ilu z anhydrytem sol jest przewaznie to obowiazkowe en the salt mine of bochnia is less famous that its neighbor one in wieliczka but it is older exploatation of the bochnia salt deposits begun in 1248ad visiting the old parts of the mine levels 3rd wernier 4th august and 6th sienkiewicz provides a great opportunity to acquire some knowledge about the geology of the region as well as about the history and tradition of lesser poland salt mining the salt deposit in bochnia based on z duda j hydzik kopalnia soli bochnia 2009 rock salt deposits in leser poland have been formed about 135 million years ago in the miocene when the carpathian mountains grow a large oblong hollow formed to their north it was then filled with water making so called miocene sea climatic conditions in the middle miocene were conducive to evaporation of water and rock salt precipitation tectonic movements caused the displacement of rocks and then leaded to the destruction of previously formed parts of the rock salt that have been broken down into blocks of different sizes this material along with other rock has been moved on the previously formed layers of salt the total time of that process was about 20 thousand years the salt deposit lays on the border of two geographical regions the sandomierz basin and the carpathians latitudinal extent of the identified deposits of salt is about 35 km its maximum width is 200 m the lowest depth level is 468 m and the drillings are approximately 520 m deep the horizontal and vertical crosssections of the salt layer are lensshaped the salt is concentrated in the northern part of the bochnia fault and is a major tectonic element in the vicinity of bochnia there are three groups of salt deposits there southern central and northern see diagram southern salts form a layer 2 to 4 m thick and it contains mainly pure salt of medium and fine grains central salts are the main wealth of the bochnia mine they lay on the slate clayanhydrite they are mainly mediumgrained edible salts gray and white so called bochnia stripped salt the thickness of this layer is about 812 m northern salts lay over anhydrite claystones they are composed of thin layers of salt and alternating layers of clay with anhydrite the salt is mostly finegrained there and it forms layers 01 to 1 m thick bochnia salt deposits were folded by the carpathian flysch the main northern fold is called bochnia anticline the southern one parallel to it is called uzbornia anticline the richest salt layers are close to the northern fold below geological scheme of the salt deposit in bochnia 1 quaternary 2 the grabowieckie layers 3 the chodenieckie layers over slat 4 the salt deposit evaporate of chloride facies 5 evaporate of sulfate facies gypsum and anhydrite 6 the skawinskie layers under salt 7 upper chalk paleogene 8 flysch of carpathians side 9 chalk from foundation of salt formation 10 faults about rock salt rock salt or halite is a monomineral rock made of sodium chloride nacl it can be transparent or semitransparent it is usually colorless or white but it may gain colors from impurities sodium chloride has a hexagonal crystal structure it breaks along its crystal planes easily it dissolves in water up to about 36 gram of nacl in 100 gram of water depending on temperature your task visit the mine find two different types of rock salt in the mine deposit write in what chambersgalleries they were located and how they looked like you need not to use proper geological terms answer correctly two questions one of the methods salt can be mined is pumping water into the deposit area do dissolve the mineral and then to recover it from water on the ground but you may notice that there is currently a waterfilled gallery in the mine why salt walls dont get dissolved hint if you get close you may stick your finger in and lick it but dont try to drink this water why making salt sculptures is much more difficult than marble granite or wooden ones dont write your answers in the log send them to me murazor using the contact form you are also encouraged to take a photo inside the mine and add it to your log but this is not mandatory uwaga trasa schodzi kilka metrow ponizej poziomu morza aby otrzymac brazowa odznake w badgegenie nalezy recznie ustawic poziom tego ec na 5m caution you will be a few meters below the sea level to receive your badgegen badge you need to manually set the altitude of this ec to 5m dodatkowe zdjecia z additional photos from jwiewiorka et al nowe dane do budowy geologicznej zloza i historii gornictwa w kopalni soli bochnia gosp sur min 23 2007 ocios i strop chodnika kontakt ilowca i pokladu soli wall and top of the gallery contact of marly clays with salt zespol ilowca z anhydrytem i dwoma pokladami soli krysztalowej clay and anhydrite complex and two layers of salt bryla soli gruboziarnistej z warstewkami bialej soli drobnoziarnistej a lump of largecrystal salt with intercalations of white finecrystal salt

situe le long de lambleve dans la commune de malmedy pont est un petit village ou il fait bon vivre je vous invite a venir le decouvrir et de faire vers le chemin jusqua grotte un lieu de recueillement la cache se situe aux alentours de la grotte inutile descalader le rocher bonne promenade located along the ambleve in the town of malmedy pont is a small village where life is peaceful i invite you to discover it and go to la grotte a place of contemplation the cache is located in the vicinity of la grotte no need to climb the rock good walk

le site the place le site de la mine detain dabbaretz est repertorie au patrimoine geologique de loireatlantique cette mine a ete exploitee a ciel ouvert jusquen 1958 elle etait lune des sources detain les plus importantes du monde antique et alimentait la route de letain vers la mediterranee on y extrait plus precisement de la cassiterite roche composee de dioxyde detain le site est composee de 3 parties la zone dextraction de 900m de long sur 100m de large et 70m de profondeur cette fosse est devenue aujourdhui un superbe etang de 15ha borde dune zone boisee la zone miniere ou avait lieu le traitement du minerai aujourdhui cette partie est amenagee en parcours de vtt le terril dune hauteur de 70m celuici a ete amenage afin que chacun puisse acceder a son sommet et decouvrir le point de vue sur la region il est le point culminant du departement de loireatlantique cest sur ce terril que nous vous proposons de vous rendre afin de prendre conscience de la grandeur du site minier et de profiter du panorama the site of the mine detain dabbaretz is listed like geological heritage of loireatlantique this mine has been open until 1958 she was one of most important source of tin during ancient times and powered the road of tin to the mediterranean there extracted more precisely cassiterite a tin oxide mineral the site is composed of three parts the extraction area 900m long 100m wide and 70m deep this pit is now a beautiful pond 15ha bordered by a wooded area the area mining for the ore processing today this part is converted into mountain biking the terril at a height of 70m this one has been developed so that everyone can access at the top and find a merveillous point of view it is the highlight of loireatlantique department it is on this terril we suggest you to go to realize the size of the mine area and enjoy the view rappel geologique geological overview comme vous le savez certainement la bretagne repose sur un socle granitique le granite est une roche eruptive formee par cristallisation resultat dun refroidissement lent en profondeur de grandes masses de magma vers la fin du processus de cristallisation du magma alors que presque toute la masse est deja solidifiee les composes les plus volatils se condensent dans les parties marginales du massif magmatique en se refroidissant lentement a des pressions elevees ces composes donnent naissance a une roche parente du granite quon nomme pegmatite les mineraux des pegmatites sont caracterises par un certain gigantisme leurs dimensions peuvent depasser plusieurs decimetres et montrent presque toujours des formes cristallines bien developpees parmi ces mineraux on y trouve la cassiterite la cassiterite fait donc partie des mineraux dit endogenes cest a dire issus de processus utilisant lenergie interne du globe as you know brittany is based on a granite base granite is an eruptive rock formed by crystallisation result of slow cooling at depth of large masses of magma towards the end of the crystallisation process of magma while nearly all the mass is already solidified the more volatile compounds condense in the marginal parts of the massive magma by slow cooling at high pressures these compounds give rise to a parent rock of granite called pegmatite minerals of pegmatites are characterized by a certain gigantism their dimensions may exceed several decimeters and shows almost always well developed crystalline forms among these minerals we find cassiterite cassiterite is a part of minerals called endogenous from a process using the internal energy of earth cassiterite et etain cassiterite and tin la cassiterite est une espece minerale composee de dioxyde detain de formule sno2 elle se caracterise par sa forte densite ses cristaux prismatiques bipyramidaux souvent agglomeres et macles en bec detain cette roche represente le principal minerai pour lextraction de letain avec une teneur pouvant depasser 78 p 100 letain sn est un metal grisargent malleable moyennement ductile a temperature ambiante il est hautement cristallise il resiste a la corrosion par leau de mer et leau douce mais peut etre attaque par les acides forts letain etait connu dans lantiquite sur toute la planete les navires pheniciens franchirent les colonnes dhercule et allerent jusquen bretagne et en cornouaille a la recherche des mines detain de nos jours letain est utilise dans la confection de nombreux alliages tel que le ferblanc la brasure les pieces de monnaie les bijoux etc il est melange avec du cuivre pour former du bronze cassiterite is a mineral composed of tin dioxide of the formula sno2 it is characterized by its high density its bipyramidal prismatic crystals often twinned and agglomerated into spout tin this rock is the main ore for the extraction of tin with a content exceeding 78 percent tin sn is a silverywhite metal malleable ductile medium at room temperature it is highly crystallized tin resists to corrosion by seawater and fresh water but can be attacked by strong acids tin was known in ancient times all over the planet the phoenician ships crossed the pillars of hercules and went to brittany and cornwall to search tin mines today tin is used in the manufacture of many alloys such as tinplate solder coins jewelry it is mixed with copper to form bronze la validation de cette earthcache log permission cette cache comme toute les earthcaches na pas de container physique pour valider celleci vous devrez vous rendre aux coordonnees indiquees et nous envoyer les reponses aux 4 questions suivantes 1 pouvezvous nous decrire comment sest forme le terril reponse sur un panneau proche du parking 2 lors de votre ascension du terril arretezvous a midistance et decrivez la couleur et laspect de la roche autour de vous 3 quelle est laltitude du terril en metres indiquee sur les tables dorientation au sommet du terril 4 quel est le numero atomique de letain recherche internet ou encyclopedique merci denvoyer vos reponses uniquement en francais ou en anglais a <email> en indiquant dans le titre la mine detain dabbaretz suivi de votre pseudo depuis le 1er janvier 2013 voici les regles vous navez pas besoin dattendre la permission du proprietaire pour loguer une earthcache le fait dexiger que quelquun attende pour pouvoir loguer ne fait pas partie des regles vous devez envoyer vos reponses au proprietaire puis vous pouvez loguer la earthcache toutefois lorsque le proprietaire examine les reponses et si il y a une difficulte ce dernier peut vous contacter afin de resoudre le probleme sil ny a aucun probleme votre log est automatiquement valide enfin nous apprecierons si vos logs sont accompagnes dune jolie photo de vous au sommet du terril bon geocaching this cache like any earthcaches does not physical container to validate it you must go to this place and send us the answers to the following questions 1 can you describe us how the terril is formed answer on a signboard near the parking 2 when you climb the terril stop halfway and describe the color and appearance of the rock around you 3 what is the altitude of the terril in meters specified on the orientation tables at the top of the terril 4 what is the atomic number of tin internet or encyclopedic search thank you to send yours answers in french or english only to <email> indicating the title la mine detain dabbaretz followed by your username from the guidelines as from january 1st 2013 people do not need to wait for permission to log your earthcache requiring someone to wait is not supported by the earthcache guidelines people should send their logging task answers to you then log your earthcache when you review their logging task answers if there is a problem you should contact them to resolve it if there is no problem then their log simply stands finally we will appreciate if your logs are accompanied by a nice photo of you at the top of the terril have fun sources brgm geowiki kasuku imagesofelementscom universalis

ouvrage dart minier unique en france la mine temoin dales a vu le jour au sortir de limmediat apresguerre en 194546 letat initia un processus de nationalisation des houilleres francaises lobjectif vise ici netait ni plus ni moins que le redressement et la consolidation economique du pays lequel setait trouve tres fortement ebranle par six annees de conflit mondial des 1946 les mineurs cevenols sinvestirent sans compter dans leffort de production nationale qui devait contribuer a relancer la france plus de 22 000 personnes travaillaient alors et contribuerent ainsi a lextraction de quelque 24 millions de tonnes de charbon la modernisation acceleree des techniques et des technologies dexploitation miniere et limportance des effectifs employes en fond ont cependant rapidement necessite la mise en place de structures specialement dediees a lapprentissage du metier de mineur certainement lun des plus durs des plus exigeants et des plus dangereux qui soient au monde cest a cet objectif que repondait precisement la mine temoin dales de 1945 date de son ouverture a 1968 date de sa fermeture ce sont plusieurs generations dapprentis mineurs qui sous la conduite dinstructeurs experimentes se sont succede dans ses galeries pour apprendre leur futur metier ce sont ces centaines de jeunes gens ages de 14 a 18 ans qui batissant sur ce qui avait ete edifie par les precedentes promotions etendant ou travaillant sans cesse les galeries etudiaient les techniques de tir a lexplosif sinitiaient aux subtilites de la taille des elements de soutenement boise ou bien apprenaient lart o combien essentiel de la manipulation et de la pose des etancons a serrage mecanique ou hydraulique temoignage exceptionnel puisque rigoureusement authentique du travail et du courage dont ont su faire preuve les jeunes mineurs cevenols pendant deux decennies la mine temoin dales se veut aujourdhui un lieu de memoire sociale et industrielle unique en france labbaye de cendras en 1230 les mines de charbon des cevennes ont ete exploitees en tout premier lieu par labbaye de cendras fondee au xe siecle sur les restes dune villa romaine qui reunira au sommet de son activite 80 moines et 150 freres le document par lequel vers 1230 labbe bernard de soucanton affecta a linfirmerie du monastere une rente annuelle prelevee sur le cens que lui versaient les exploitants de la terre noire constitue leur premiere mention connue ce nest que plus tard en 1321 que dautres ecrits apportent la preuve que le charbon est extrait a rochelamoliere pres de saintetienne loire cependant des ecrits de 1206 concernent une vente de biens comprenant une exploitation houillere dans la region de boussagues herault en 1647 des fermiers des mines de charbon dans le bassin dales se reunissent au sein dun syndicat concurrent des petits exploitants contraints de vendre a bas prix un arret du conseil date du 13 mai 1698 stipule que tous les proprietaires de terres ouvertes ou non ouvertes peuvent les exploiter a leur profit mais dans le gard cette decision reste lettre morte les guerres de religion entrainent labandon des mines leur mise a sac et la destruction des industries annexes de lexploitation du charbon1 larret du 14 janvier 1744 qui institue une premiere reglementation des mines de charbon oblige les exploitants a faire des demandes de concession mais cette loi est peu respectee dans le departement1 en 1760 on compte une quinzaine de petites societes minieres dans la region2 un mineralogiste ambitieux qui utilise la traction animale dans les galeries en 1764 le mineralogiste pierrefrancois tubeuf venu de normandie se lance dans lexploitation miniere il acquiert une grande experience en bretagne puis a la mine de charbon cransac dans le bassin de decazeville aveyron region alors appelee le rouergue pour des compagnies minieres il y a cree les premiers chevalements et introduit le roulage au fond de la mine en utilisant la traction animale dans les petites tailles sinspirant des chiens de traineaux il aussi obtenu une concession de 1 an a saintpauletdecaisson pres du comtat venaissin apres quelques visites dans les basses cevennes il constate la richesse miniere de cette zone et demande une concession au roi car elle lui parait la plus interessante le 24 mars 1774 il obtient finalement du roi louis xv la concession exclusive pour 30 ans de lexploitation des mines du gard dans la region dales saintambroix uzes pontsaintesprit villefort3 anduze ce qui inclut une zone de plus de 3 000 kilometres carres il doit en retour dedommager les proprietaires de terrains et verser 800 livres par an a lecole royale des mines cest le passage de petites exploitations artisanales composees de quelques ouvriers a des concessions de type capitaliste 4 il obtient aussi la concession pour 30 ans des futures mines de rochebelle pour la premiere fois en cevennes du personnel specialise venant dallemagne ou dangleterre est engage pour creuser les puits et mettre en place des systemes de drainage et de ventilation certains puits atteignent 200 pieds de profondeur la guerre contre le duc de castries ministre du roi mais le conseil de ville vote en 1777 une protestation contre la demande de tubeuf concessionnaire de faire fermer les ouvertures par lesquelles les habitants allaient chercher euxmemes du charbon dans des mines artisanales et dangereuses un long conflit sengage pierrefrancois tubeuf est chasse a coups de pierre en 1784 au chateau de trouillas par les proprietaires de la region et les hommes de main du marechal de castries marechal de france et ministre du roi qui afferme la mine de trouillas a un petit exploitant5 puis rachete le comte dales en vue de sallier avec les petits producteurs locaux que pierrefrancois tubeuf concurrencait6 tubeuf est meme gravement blesse perdant un oeil dans laffrontement devant la resistance contre le nouvel exploitant un arret du roi sursoit a la prise de possession des mines par tubeuf qui part en amerique le duc de castries recupere a son profit en 1786 les mines de charbon depossedees de tubeuf mais il revient en 1790 racheter son bien en 1820 la femme de pierrefrancois tubeuf et son fils recuperent la mine de rochebelle2 puis font construire une verrerie et le chateau de traquette la ligne de chemin de fer bouleverse la donne les moyens de transport ont toujours manque7 le charbon sort sur des sentiers muletiers et le trajet augmente son cout dau moins 75 lexploitation sera surtout stimulee dans les annees suivant lachevement en 1839 de la voie ferree de la compagnie des mines de la grandcombe et des chemins de fer du gard entre la grandcombe et beaucaire une des premieres en france grace a paulin talabot polytechnicien qui est alle sinformer en angleterre aupres de robert et george stephenson sur lindustrie ferroviaire la gare de ners entre nimes et ales darchitecture en vogue a lepoque en angleterre nest sans doute pas sans rappeler cette influence en 1828 la creation des forges et fonderies de tamaris puis de la societe civile de rochebelle et trelys aboutit en 1834 a labsorption par la cie des fonderies et forges dalais qui exploite principalement pour ses usines tandis que la compagnie des mines de la grandcombe regroupe en 1836 a linitiative de paulin talabot la compagnie houillere de besseges qui reprend les concessions de madame de suffren et la cie des mines de rochebelle creee par le marechal soult au debut des annees 1830 pour lexploration du domaine de francois pierre de tuboeuf la cie des mines de portes et senechas sera ensuite developpee en 1854 par le financier jules mires aujourdhui il ne subsiste plus que la mine temoin une galerie de 800 metres entierement reconstituee a lidentique qui servit de mine ecole entre 1945 et 1968 pour les futurs mineurs qui apprenaient leur metier elle permet de decouvrir depuis 1985 quelle est ouverte au public ce quetait le travail des mineurs au fond on y accede par une cage au niveau dun chevalement puis le guide nous raconte lhistoire du labeur de ses propres aieuls rappel geologique le charbon terme generique est une roche combustible constituee danciens debris vegetaux il se classe en diverses varietes en fonction de sa teneur en carbone cette teneur est dautant plus importante que le charbon a subi des modifications importantes en temperature et en pression au cours des temps geologiques ainsi la tourbe contient 55 de carbone la lignite entre 70 et 75 la houille 85 lanthracite entre 92 et 95 le terme ultime etant le graphite avant de devenir dans des conditions extremes le diamant

wagonik kwk victoria takie kopalniane wagoniki mozna spotkac w kilku miejscach boguszowa gorc tak do konca nie mam informacji czym tak naprawde one sa pamiatka dawnych czasow a moze symbolem upadku kopaln jeden z nich znajduje sie w gorcach na ulicy romualda traugutta upamietniajacy kopalnie wegla kamiennego victoria poczatki gornictwa w boguszowiegorcach pierwsze rozdzialy historii gornictwa boguszowa zaczeli wykuwac wspomniani saksonscy gwarkowie historia pisana a wlasciwie kuta gwareckimi oskardami byla dostrzegalna w dwojnasob posiadala metaliczny dzwiek i srebrna barwe dzieki pracy gwarkow miasto rozwija sie gospodarczo w roku 1499 z rak krola czeskiego wladyslawa jagiellonczykasyna polskiego krola kazimierza jagiellonczyka wiec zwiazki z polska otrzymuje prawa miejskie i wszystkie przywileje z tym statusem zwiazane o asymilacji saksonskich przybyszow i ich potomkow ze spolecznoscia lokalna swiadczy nastepujace wydarzenie w roku 1533 jako spolecznosc luteranska buduja la concession de wolfram detain et de metaux connexes est instituee par decret du 1er mai 1905 elle couvre alors 482 ha et appartient a mm surcouf perforante et corticospinaux lexploitation de la mine est octroyee a la societe miniere de montbelleux dirigee par m bayle qui realise des travaux de recherche de 1903 a 1906 la premiere periode dexploitation qui debute le 15 mai 1907 voit la mise en route dune usine de preparation de produit mineral dite lavoir a minerai avec linstallation dune table schlamms qui a permis le traitement de 591 t de minerai brut la baisse des cours du wolfram entraine linterruption des travaux en 1908 en 1910 constitution de la societe en nom collectif gruzardclolus et courtois en 1916 les travaux sont desservis par trois puits en 1918 lextraction moyenne est de 41 t par jour de minerai brut fournissant 221 kg de wolfram un incendie survenu au lavoir stoppe toute lexploitation en juillet 1936 la societe miniere de montbelleux est mise en decheance le 12 juin 1937 la concession est remise en exploitation et vendue a edgar brandt en 1942 des travaux preparatoires sont entrepris avec la mise en place dune ligne de chemin de fer qui relie la concession a la gare de la selleenluitre et letablissement dun raccordement de la mine a la ligne electrique haute tension cette quatrieme periode dexploitation prend fin en 1944 par un sabotage et le depart des allemands suivi dune periode de pillage en 194850 le service local des mines fait pression sur le concessionnaire pour que lexploitation reprenne apres la remise en etat de quelques batiments en 1951 et le denoyage en 1952 la reprise est effective en 1954 avec notamment ledification dun lavoir de pre concentration en 1957 la societe des mines de montbelleux soriente vers une activite reduite en raison dune production insuffisante et de la baisse du cours du wolfram jusquen 1972 date de sa revalorisation en 1980 installation dune usine de preparation de produit mineral dite laverie gravimetrique malgre diverses installations complementaires et en raison de linadaptation de la methode dexploitation qui entraine des effondrements la mine cesse toute activite le 9 aout 1983 le site est desaffecte de 1903 a 1906 les travaux de recherche occupent deux maa®tresmineurs et quatrevingts ouvriers en 1907 mention dune chaudiere a vapeur en 1908 la mine emploie deux cent quatre ouvriers dont cent dix huit hommes au fond en octobre 1942 leffectif est de 300 hommes environ dont 30 allemands il va oscille autour de 550 19511958 cinquieme periode dexploitation les travaux furent confies a la societe des mines de puys les vignes 19481950 effectif 140 personnes dont 84 ouvriers au fond en fevrier 1975 licenciement de 47 ouvriers 24 nouveaux debauches en aout 1957 sur un effectif de 56 19771983 nouvelle exploitation 1976 sondages a partir de la surface pour reconnaa®tre laval des granulites de 1977 a 1980 nouvelle phase dexploration denoyage et remise en etat de lancienne mine infrastructures batiment etc nombreux sondages de 1980 a 1983 une descenderie est realisee et dessert les niveaux 6095 et 130 metres une laverie de capacite 40theures est construite23 fevrier 1983 en novembre 1982 58 salaries directionadministration 5 personnes personnel au fond 30 mineurs et conducteurs dengins au jour 23 laverie et divers arret de lexploitation definitive 2006 la societe des mines de montbelleux engage la procedure darret des travaux miniers en 2010 une association se cree la 3 m montbelleux memoire de la mine de montbelleux pour but la sauvegarde de la memoire miniere du site de montbelleux en 2013 fougeres communaute achete le site des travaux de renovation sont en cours a ce jour

je vous propose de decouvrir un pan souvent meconnu ou oublie de lhistoire de la vendee celle de lextraction miniere duranium vous ne craignez absolument rien sur ce site qui netait quun site dextraction de la pechblende oxyde duranium la concentration pour obtenir le fameux yellow cake ou gateau jaune se faisait a getigne loireatlantique cette mine duranium dont lextraction sest faite uniquement a ciel ouvert est situee immediatement a lest de la commune de mortagnesursevre elle fait partie avec le site dexploitation de le retail de la concession devrunes lextraction duranium sy est faite entre 1957 et 1960 puis en 1986 ce qui permit den extraire environ 47 tonnes contexte historique apres la seconde guerre mondiale le gouvernement francais se lance dans la recherche de gisements duranium notamment dans les terrains hercyniens du massif armoricain du massif central et des vosges cest en 1950 que le gouvernement francais debute la prospection de luranium dans le massif armoricain la division miniere de vendee est fonde par le commissariat a lenergie atomique cea a mortagnesursevre en 1954 qui deviendra cogema puis areva suite a la decouverte de gisements duranium dans la zone granitique qui setend de clisson loireatlantique a parthenay deuxsevres les resultats etant prometteurs la division miniere de vendee est creee en 1954 elle sinstalle sur le site de fleuriais a mortagnesursevre a lemplacement dune ancienne usine textile sous son administration de nombreuses mines sont ouvertes en deuxsevres vendee loireatlantique et maineetloire les travaux seffectuent en mines souterraines et a ciel ouvert a la limite de la vendee et des deuxsevres la commanderie sera le second gisement de la division par limportance de sa production pres de 4000 tonnes duranium les autres sites du departement de vendee peu productifs nauront quune courte periode dactivite luranium vendeen a employe jusqua cinq cents mineurs repartis sur quatre departements il a permis de produire lequivalent de deux ans de la consommation francaise delectricite des annees 1990 interet geologique les prospections effectuees a partir des annees 1951 ont montre que lessentiel des mineralisations uraniferes se trouvaient au pourtour du massif granitique hercynien de mortagnesursevre au contact tectonique souvent mylonitique entre ce dernier et les metamorphites qui lentourent migmatites amphibolites seule la mine de la commanderie se situe a linterieur du massif le long dune faille recoupant les accidents bordiers dans les gisements de la region des herbiers les mineralisations uraniferes sont restreintes aux gneiss migmatitiques qui sont au sud du contact avec le granite ou enclaves a linterieur de celuici bien que spectaculaires en surface pechblende massive avec gummi tes les mineralisations se sont averees trop ponctuelles pour permettre une exploitation importante

to the cave park infront of the old defunct duino train station walk straight till you get to the bridgeoverpass crossing the traintracks follow the track till you get to see a small house just parallel on the traintracks follow the path till you see a path that goes north you will see a manmade stone wall around the area and look for a path that crosses it head north till you see a large fallen dead tree from here you are on your own no more paths but i suggest follow the stonewallline trust you gps be careful of thorns and sharp stones if you see some patch of pinetrees then you are near the cave some meters infront of the cave is a pile of rocks that came probably inside the cave you will see some pieces of cavestones mineralstones quite different from the typical carso stones important wear good shoes as the stones are sharp long trousers as the area is full of thorns you might get lost and disoriented just follow your gps signal following the hiking path on some maps even from geocaching website is not recommended as the approach from the north is very much dangerous and wild i suggest you approach it from the south inside the cave enter the cave a flashlighttorch is recommended to enter the cave but not necessary around 20meters from the entrance of the cave there is an area with an opening that lets natural light from outside the cache is hidden here see spoiler foto cache is not hidden very high its in a small opening near a small piece of wood cache is behind a small loose stone please put it back the same way you found it warning if you want to explore the rest of the cave be sure to have proper caving equipments enter at your own risk a few meters ahead is a very deep hole

grotta di nettuno neptunes grotto italian grotta di nettuno catalan cova de neptu is a stalactite cave near the town of alghero on the island of sardinia italy the cave was discovered by local fishermen in the 18th century and has since developed into a popular tourist attraction the grotto gets its name from the roman god of the sea neptune grotta di nettuno e una caverna di stalattite vicino allla cita di alghero in sardegna italia la grotta fu scoperta da un pescatore locale nel 18deg secolo e fin dallora si rivelo una popolare attrazione turistica la grotta prende il suo nome dalla divinita romana dell mare nettuno access to the cave accesso alla grotta the entrance to the grotto lies only around a metre above the sea level at the foot of the 110metrehigh capo caccia cliffs and the cave can therefore only be visited when the waters below are calm a stairway cut into the cliff in 1954 the 654step escala del cabirolgoats steps leads from a car park at the top of the cliff down to the entrance the grotto is also accessible via a short boat trip from the port of alghero these trips are arranged hourly during the summer but less frequently during spring and autumn the building of the staircase takes 10 years before the cave was accessible only by boat lingresso della grotta si trova a circa un metro sopra il livello del mare ai piedi dei 110 metri delle alte falesie di capo caccia e quindi si puo visitare solamente quando il mare e calmo una scalinata panoramica di 656 gradini costruita nel 1954 la cosidetta escala del cabirol la scala del capriolo conduce dal parcheggio in cima della scogliera alingresso la grotta e accessibile anche via mare con un imbarcazione che parte dal porto di alghero questi brevi viaggi sono organizzati ogni ora durante lestate ma meno frequentemente durante la primavera e lautunno la costruzione della scalinata e durata 10 anni prima la grotta era accessibile solo in barca a short cave description corta descrizione della grotta the combined length of the cave system is estimated to be around 4 kilometers but only a few hundred metres are accessible to the public inside are passages of lit stalactite and stalagmite formations and a 120metrelong saltwater lake which is at sea level the cave was once a habitat for the mediterranean monk seal which has become extinct in the area the history of the caves of neptune dates back to prehistoric times several tracks belonging to the neolithic found within them suggest that about 2000000 years have passed by since their formation its almost certain that the primitive men knew and use them according to their needs la lunghezza complessiva del sistema di grotte e stimata in circa 4 km ma solo poche centinaia di metri sono accessibili al pubblico allinterno ci sono passaggi di formazioni di stalattiti e stalagmiti illuminate e un lago di acqua salata di 120 metri di lunghezza che e al livello del mare la grotta era una volta un habitat per la mediteranea foca monaca che si e estinta nella zona la storia delle grotte di nettuno risale ai tempi preistorici diverse tracce appartenenti al neolitico rinvenute al loro interno fanno pensare che siano trascorsi circa 2000000 di anni dalla sua formazione e quasi certo che gli uomini primitivi le conoscessero e le utilizzassero in base alle proprie esigenze opening hours orari di apertura april eng the formation of stalactites and stalagmites we can trace the words stalactite and stalagmite back to the greek word stalassein which means to drip this is fitting because it describes how both are formed in nature although they look lifelike and a little creepy stalactites and stalagmites grow simply because of water running over and through inorganic material limestone caves where most stalactites and stalagmites are found are mainly composed of calcite a common mineral found in sedimentary rocks calcite molecules are made of calcium and carbonate ions and are referred to as caco3 or calcium carbonate when rainwater falls over a cave and trickles through rocks it picks up carbon dioxide and minerals from limestone if we add water carbon dioxide and calcium carbonate together we get this equation h20 + co2 + caco3 = ca hco32 ca hco32 is known as calcium bicarbonate and the water carries the substance basically dissolved calcite through the cracks of the roof of a cave once water comes into contact with the air inside the cave however some of the calcium bicarbonate is transformed back into calcium carbonate and calcite starts to form around the crack as water continues to drip the length and thickness of the calcite grows and eventually a stalactite forms on the ceiling it can take a very long time for most stalactites to form they usually grow anywhere between a quarterinch and an inch every century and now the most important questions are 1 try to describe why lot of stalactites in this cave did not grow in vertical way as usually are and each in the other direction 2 there is a plate dedicated to carlo alberto how many rows of text are on the plate 3 in the cave there is great decoration send me two names of embellishment inside the cave the exact name of those figures 4 option there is a area inside where is possible to do the picture so do one and post it you can log immediately with picture or send the answer via my profile and log after if the answers are not correct i will contact you cache it la formazione di stalattiti e stalagmiti la stalattite e una formazione calcarea pendente dalla sommita delle grotte soggette a fenomeni di carsismo si forma a seguito dei continui e prolungati depositi di minerali trasportati dalle acque percolanti nella grotta in particolare del bicarbonato di calcio che poi precipita in carbonato di calcio che si deposita e forma cosi la stalattite la stalattite ha generalmente una forma cilindrica o di cono allungato ma se la grotta e percorsa da correnti daria puo deviare dal suo asse verticale e assumere forme bizzarre quando una stalattite si congiunge a una stalagmite si ha la formazione di una colonna la formazione delle grandi stalattiti richiede tempi lunghissimi dellordine anche di migliaia di anni una curiosita e costituita da una forma iniziale di stalattite la cannula che si presenta come un tubicino semitrasparente attraverso cui passano le gocce dacqua se la volta della grotta ne presenta tante dal basso si ha la sensazione di una cascata di spaghetti il nome stalattite deriva dalla parola greca stalaktites stalaktites con il significato di gocciolante la stalattite piu lunga conosciuta si trova nella camera delle rarita nella gruta rei do mato sete lagoas minas geraisbrasile ed e lunga 20 metri 1 prova a descrivere il motivo per cui molte stalattiti nella grotta non si sono formati in modo verticale ma in ogni altra direzione 2 vi e un piatto dedicato a carlo alberto quante righe di testo sono sul piatto 3 la grotta e molto ornamentale e affascinante inviami i nomi di due formazioni allinterno della grotta il nome esatto di queste figure 4 opzione vi e una zona allinterno dove e possibile fare la foto quindi fatene una e mandatela e possibile accedere immediatamente con la foto o inviare la risposta tramite il mio profilo e accedere dopo se le risposte non sono corrette vi contatero

zone protegee sur une moraine frontale qui se etend le long de la lagune de la vistule de la cote baltique au xixe siecle la ville est devenue la propriete du dernier empereur allemand et roi de prusse guillaume ii de hohenzollern merci a les environs magnifiques lempereur a ordonne de construire sa residence dete ici un certain nombre dautres batiments a ete construit ici ce temps notamment manufacture de ceramique specialisee dans la production de faience pour les besoins empereur et de la poterie qui a rapidement gagne la reconnaissance en prusse et a letranger dimportants gisements de materiaux argileux brutes ont contribue au la creation de nombreuses briqueteries le region des collines delblag est un des regions les plus interessantes du nord de la pologne notamment en raison de la specificite geomorphologique visible dans les chantiers de la mine sur la lagune de la vistule kadyny peklewo suchacz nadbrzeze a la fin du tertiaire et debut du quaternaire il ya environ 187 millions dannees le climat mondial a change profondement et rapidement basses temperatures dair et fortes chutes de neige qui ne fond pas au cours de lete mais se accumule ont contribue a les enormes inlandsis il a ete appele le glaciation du pleistocene processus de formation du plateau suivie au cours des quatre glaciation scandinave eburonien couvert environ 90 de la pologne elsterien saalien interglaciaire riss wurm et la derniere periode glaciaire populairement connu comme la derniere periode glaciaire le weichselien ou glaciation de weichsel les formations quaternaires indiquent de grandes deformations dans la disposition des couches en raison de divers mecanismes dont le role le plus important a ete joue par les processus intensifs glacitectoniques causees par la pression de la glace ou friction de la glace sur le sol exagere ou deformation du substrat et les sediments glaciaires ou fluvioglaciaires observations passees indiquent que les perturbations se sont produites plusieurs fois vous etes dans une mine exploitee et abandonnee dargile brute les matieres brutes ont ete extraits ici pour la production de la ceramique ces materiaux etaient principalement des argiles rouges et argiles delblag argiles yoldia contenant des coquilles de mollusques moules arctiques portlandia yoldia arctica ce sont les seuls depots de ce type en pologne avant le front du glacier les depots dargile froissees et ils se leverent donc maintenant les argiles delblag sont quelques dizaines de metres audessus du niveau actuel de la mer dans cet endroit vous pouvez observer avec precision une accumulation de sediments tres fort et pressant cause par le glacier les sediments dominants dans ce depot sont limon gris ou limon verdatre contenant flore arctique et argile rouge avec infiltration rouillee et sans aucune macrofaune ces limons transforment peu a peu en une argile souvent avec des inserts de sable le loam limoneux contenant macrofaune se caracterise par une texture specifique il est presque lache limon se compose de petits morceaux individuels que vous pouvez facilement ecraser avec vos doigts cette faible densite est du au faible nombre de substance dargile presente dans le limon dautre part cette coherence du fromage semble indiquer que les argiles delblag nont pas ete soumis a la pression plus forte qui pourrait les compresse plus fort on pourrait aussi supposer quils ont ete givres et apres avoir quitte l inlandsis et apres decongelation ils conservent leur texture actuelle il serait indiquee par la conservation a linterieur de largile fragile coquille yoldia en bon etat de plus on trouve ici les argiles grasses 65 de largile de couleur chocolatrouge avec des nuances differentes ils sont fortement comprimes ce qui rend difficile leur exploitation en particulier en ete comme il ressort de linterpretation des etudes petrographiques et mineralogiques ces materiaux bruts ont ete crees lors de la phase de torun precedant <url> english kadyny former old prussian fortress situated in the elblag upland landscape park a protected area on a terminal moraine stretching along the vistula lagoon of the baltic coast in the nineteenth century the town became the property of the last german emperor and king of prussia william ii of hohenzollern thanks to the beautiful surroundings the emperor ordered to build his summer residence here a number of other buildings has been created here that time including ceramic manufactory specializing in the production of majolica for the emperor needs and pottery which quickly gained recognition both in prussia and abroad large deposits of raw clay materials contributed to the creation of numerous brickyards the elblag upland is one of the most interesting regions in the northern poland especially because of the physiographic distinctiveness in relation to the surrounding regions as well as because of the extremely diverse and complex geological structure visible in the mine workings on the vistula lagoon kadyny peklewo suchacz nadbrzeze in the late tertiary and early quaternary about 187 million years ago profound and rapid changes in global climate occured negative air temperatures and heavy snowfall which does not melt during the summer but accumulates have contributed to the huge ice sheets it was called the pleistocene ice age plateau formation process followed during the four scandinavian glaciation kansan glaciation covered approx 90 of poland central poland glaciation the eemian interglacial riss wurm and the last glacial period popularly known as the ice age baltic glaciation or vistulian the quaternary formations show great deformations in the arrangement of layers due to various mechanisms among which the most important role was played by intensive processes glacitectonic caused by pressure or rubbing ice on the ground exaggeration deformation of the substrate and sediments glacial and glaciofluvial past observations indicate that disturbances occurred here several times you are in an exploited and abandoned raw clay mine raw materials were mined here for the purpose of ceramic works these materials were mostly red clays and elblag clays yoldia clays containing shells of shellfish arctic mussels portlandia yoldia arctica these are the only deposits of this type in poland before the glacier forehead the clay deposits wrinkled and rose therefore now the elblag clays are a few dozen meters above the current sea level in this place you can accurately observe a very strong sediment accumulation and squeezing caused by the glacier the dominant sediments in this deposit are gray or greenish silt containing arctic flora and red clay with rusty infiltration and without any macrofauna these silts gradually transform into a clay frequently with sandy inserts silt loam containing macrofauna is characterized by a specific texture it is almost loose silt consists of individual small lumps that can be effortlessly crushed with the fingers this low density is due to the relatively small number of clay substance present in the silt on the other hand this cheesy consistency would indicate that the elblag clays were not subjected to the stronger pressure which would compress them harder one might also assume that they were frosted and after leaving the ice sheet and defrosting they retain their current texture this would be indicated by the preservation not damaged fragile shell yoldia inside the clay moreover we can find here the greasy clays 65 of the clay of chocolatered color with different shades they are highly compressed which makes them difficult to exploitation especially in the summer as follows from the interpretation of petrographicmineralogical studies these raw materials were created during the stage of torun preceding the main stadial vistula glaciation vistulian although the deposit is already depleted you can still find visible remains of raw materials and now a few la miniera la passata inizia ad essere scavata dal xixdeg secolo le prime gallerie furono scavate nel 1888 si estraeva la galena ovvero solfuro di piombo che e il principale minerale utile per lestrazione di piombo ma nel passato la galena e stata estratta piu per il suo contenuto di argento che per la produzione di piombo lo sfruttamento massimo si ha dalla fine del 800 allinizio della prima guerra mondiale quando i filoni ormai erano quasi esauriti dopo la guerra si prosegui lestrazione in maniera discontinua ma essa si arresto con la seconda guerra mondiale e da quel momento la miniera la passata fu abbandonata definitivamente maggiori informazioni si possono trovare sul cartello informativo antistante lingresso della miniera il cache e nascosco nella galleria piu lontana dallingresso in fondo ad un vicolo cieco la posizione esatta e indicata con una x nellimmagine della planimetria di questo listing attenzione nonostante non ci siano particolari difficolta e importante mantenere la massima cautela soprattutto a causa dei fornelli profondi svariati metri che collegano diversi livelli e cui passerete molto vicini la miniera e un ambiente ostile non ci sono indicazioni allinterno quindi vi consiglio di stampare la planimetria della miniera che trovate tra le immagini e di muovervi per le gallerie consapevoli della posizione in cui siete e dobbligo una torcia frontale controllate di avere le batterie cariche e che sia abbastanza forte da illuminare per bene la galleria e mostrare i pericoli e consigliato il caschetto per non pestare la testa quando le gallerie si fanno piu basse vi prego di risistemare la cache esattamente come lavete trovata e di mantenerla coperta da pietre the mine la passata begins to be dug from the nineteenth century the first tunnels were excavated in 1888 the mineral galena or lead sulfide which is the main mineral useful for the extraction of lead in the past the galena was extracted more for its silver content instead of the production of lead the maximum exploitation of the mine occured from the end of 800 to the beginning of world war i when the veins of lead sulfide were almost exhausted after the war the extraction continued discontinuously and it was stopped due to world war ii and then the mine la passata was finally abandoned more information can be found on the information board in front of the entrance of the mine the cache is hidden farthest from the entrance to the mine at the end of a dead tunnel the exact location is indicated with an x in the image of the floor plan of this listing warning although there are no particular difficulties it is important to maintain the utmost caution especially because of the several deep holes that links different levels the mine is a hostile environment there are no signs inside so i recommend you to print the map of the mine that you can found in the images of the listing and to move for tunnels aware of the location where you are you obligation of a powerful torch check that you have the batteries charged and that it is strong enough to illuminate well the gallery and show the dangers it is recommended to wear an helmet to protect your head please reposition the cache exactly as you found it and keep it covered with stones

le cave di gesso di signols panorama le cave di gesso di signols coltivate fin dal xvii secolo rivestono grande interesse dal punto di vista paesaggistico ambientale e minearologico sono inserite nel sito di interesse comunitario sic denominato oasi xerotermica di oulx auberge caratterizzato da un fitto bosco di pino silvestre nel bosco si incontrano i resti delle teleferiche e delle strutture delle cave mentre nelle pareti di gesso si aprono le gallerie larea riveste grande interesse per gli studiosi di mineralogia poiche qui e stata scoperta nel 2006 lambrinoite solfosale idratodi potassio unico al mondo accesso il sito e raggiungibile tramite strada sterrata chiusa al traffico percorribile in circa 50 minuti a piedi o in bici in alternativa si puo percorrere un ombroso e suggestivo sentiero con alcuni tratti ripidi circa 40 minuti anche se privo di difficolta escursionistiche si consiglia di percorrerlo con calzature adeguate infatti la presenza di substrato scivoloso sconsiglia la percorrenza durante periodi piovosi i cache sono stati posizionati in modo da farvi percorrere entrambe gli accessi compiendo un anello si consiglia la strada sterrata per la salita e il sentiero per la discesa ma siete liberi di affrontarli come meglio credete attrezzatura scarponi leggeri ciaspole in caso di neve borraccia fontana lungo la sterrata e sorgente lungo il sentiero alle cave non ce acqua si prega di riportare a valle i rifiuti e mantenere larea pulita il cache e un petling contenente il logbook e una matita per preservare il piu a lungo possibile il cache rimettere a posto il contenitore esattamente nella posizione iniziale la camminata si puo affrontare in inverno con la presenza di neve opportunamente dotati di ciaspole e scarponi il cache e stato posizionato in assenza di neve ma probabilmente e accessibile e ritrovabile anche in caso di neve tenere in considerazione la situazione meteo click sullicona a causa della morfologia del terreno il segnale gps non e affidabile una volta sul luogo controllare le foto spoiler the chalk mines of signols the view the chalk miness of signols cultivated since the xvii century are of great interest from the point of view of landscape environmental and minearologico they are included in the site of community interest sic called oasis xerothermic oulx auberge characterized by a dense forest of pine in the forest there are the remains of the cable cars and the structures of the quarries and in the walls of plaster open galleries the area is of great interest to students of mineralogy because here was discovered in 2006 ambrinoite solfosale idratodi potassium unique in the world access the site is accessible by dirt road closed to traffic takes about 50 minutes on foot or by bike alternatively you can take a shady and suggestive path with some steep sections about 40 minutes although no difficulty hiking you should follow it with appropriate footwear indeed the presence of substrate slippery advises against traveling during rainy periods the caches were positioned so as to make travel both accesses making a ring we recommend the dirt road to climb and the path for the descent but you are free to deal with them as you want equipment lightweight boots snowshoes in case of snow water bottle there is a fountain along the dirt road and the source along the path at the cave there is no water please restore downstream waste and keep the area clean the cache is a petling with the logbook and the pencil inside to preserve for as long as possible the cache replace the container exactly into the initial position the walk can be faced in the winter with the presence of snow properly equipped with snow shoes and boots the cache has been positioned in the absence of snow and probably is accessible and retrievable in winter take into consideration the weather situation click on the icon because of the morphology of the land the gps signal is not reliable once on the site check the photos spoiler

continenti la laurasia e il gondwana separati da un nuovo oceano la tetide loceano era caratterizzato da una dorsale medioceanica dalla quale fuoriuscivano lave che formarono la nuova crosta oceanica successivamente ricoperta da sedimenti marini favoriti da un clima tropicale si formarono lungo le coste delle barriere coralline come le attuali barriere australiane e del mar rosso 130 milioni di anni fa il gonwdana e la laurasia iniziarono ad avvicinarsi e la crosta oceanica con i suoi sedimenti marini si inabisso al di sotto della crosta continentale piu leggera a grandi profondita e quindi ad alte temperature e pressioni le rocce si trasformarono metamorfismo cambiando la loro composizione mineralogica e furono deformate e piegate eocene oligocene eartcache per logare questo cache formed along the coral reefs such as the current australian reff and red sea reef 130 million years ago the gonwdana and laurasia started to gather and oceanic crust with its marine sediments sank le cave di fiesole maiano sono celebri per la pietra arenaria la cosiddetta pietra fiesolana ampiamente impiegata da scultori fin dal secolo xv tra il xvii e il xviii secolo le cave del fiesolano furono bandite e riservate esclusivamente ai monumenti fiorentini tra le ultime opere realizzate con la pietra fiesolana si ricordano le colonne dellatrio la scala e altri elementi architettonici della biblioteca nazionale centrale di firenzeuna volta dismessa la cava e stata allestita per larrampicata sportiva sono tuttora infatti presenti numerose vie di arrampicata purtroppo malmesse e pericolanti raggiunta la parete noterete su di essa diverse scritte di colore gialloarancione queste sono i nomi delle diverse vie di arrampicata stanno ad indicare che da li comincia la via la cache e nascosta in prossimita di una di queste scritte nomi il nome della via vicino al quale e nascosta la cache e xy per scoprire il nome della via dovete risolvere un equazione e rispondere ad una facile domanda 1 27x 9x = 64 12 + 2 il risultato vi dara x 2 la prima di via il risultato vi dara y una volta trovato il nome della via comincia la caccia si prega di riposizionare la cache nella stessa posizione in cui lavete trovata

grotta di lourdes 3 chiampo costruita da fra claudio granzotto e benedetta con linaugurazione il 29091935 e il richiamo principale per i fedeli che gia da subito nel centenario lourdiano del 1958 affluirono in ben 200 mila pellegrini e difatti il fulcro di tutto il grande movimento religioso che si e sviluppato in questi ultimi decenni riconosciuto anche dal papa giovanni paolo iideg con la beatificazione di fra claudio il 20111994 la grotta voluta come motivo devozionale per i ragazzi del seminario francescano si e trasformata in centro di fede e meta di pellegrini che si succedono incessantemente facendo divenire storia la profezia del beato claudio che durante la costruzione della grotta quando sembrava venir interrotta da contrarieta insormontabili e restare quindi un sogno infranto disse questa grottadiventera un luogo di preghiera e qui verra tanta gente come testimonia la scritta vicino larco di entrata in marmo paglierino alla fine del viale alberato il beato claudio con devozione e competenza la costrui come copia fedele e in dimensioni perfettamente uguali a quella di massabielle in francia riproducendone le sinuosita capricciose le cavita bizzarre e gli strapiombi di quella dei pirenei ha una larghezza maxdi m34 altezza di m15 di roccia + m4 di verde eil risultato di 2 anni di fatiche e sudori con materiale per 2000 quintali di cemento e tonnellate di ferro nel cavo della roccia e collocata la statua dell immacolata concezione scolpita da fra claudio prof riccardo granzotto in marmo di carrara suggestiva per lispirazione religiosa e la mirabile fattura tecnica secondo carlotta frattini lartista infuse nel marmo la sua trepida venerazione alla vergine ed anche qualche cosa della calma e della stessa serenita che egli aveva trovate nella vita claustrale la statua e alta m178 ha una posa ispirata e come dice ippolito guggia ha unespressione di bonta di sorriso e di grazia che incanta mariano apa rileva la statua rievoca la realizzazione ascesa dellimmacolata a mani giunte e viso proteso occhi aperti in celestiale visione sembra parlare e comunicare lintercessione tra il signore ed il fedele secondo fra claudio la signora vista da bernardette doveva avere una forte espressione di grazia un fascino sovrumano di estasi per questo se era stato meticoloso nel copiare la grotta di massabielle si stacco invece decisamente dallesemplare di francia prodotto dallo scultore prof giuseppe fabich a completare lambiente davanti la grotta il monumento a bernadette soubirous del 1942 costruito dallo stesso granzotto sepoltoaccanto alla grotta medesima in una tomba costruita nel 1980 su progetto dellingferruccio zecchin in occasione della riesumazione legata al processo di beatificazione e realizzata in pietra bianca nel luogo preciso dellantica sepoltura testimonia con le sue forme semplici la vita di fra claudio limmediato ambiente esterno e costituito dalla balaustra in marmo di forma circolare che recinge ed apparta la grotta creandovi attorno una zona di raccoglimento e di silenzio e dal parco fra claudio ora tramutato nella via dolorosa o via crucis e ad un vasto cortile attorno al monumento dellincoranata alto m750 uguale a quello di lourdes e costruito nel 1954 a ricordo del centenario del dogma dellimmacolata e posto su un ceppo di marmo e sul basamento che sostiene la vergine si trova un pezzo di roccia di lourdes vicino troviamo poi il museo padre aurelio menin diviso in 10 sezioni che raccoglie oltre la gipsoteca raccolta di gessi del beato claudio anche tutto il patrimonio culturale suddiviso in geologia applicata lastre marmoree malacologia collezione di conchiglie paletnologia reperti preistorici paleontologia fossili etnologia raccolta di oggetti darte di vari popoli mineralogia minerali zoologia animali imbalsamati arti figurative e della valle del chiampo opere artistiche ed artigianali la grotta di chiampo e diventata una sorgente di pieta mariana ove i pellegrini ormai con flusso annuale di circa 850000 incessantemente arrivano da tutta italia e dallestero intrecciandone preghiere e canti e vengono a venerare fra claudio che accogliendo il messsaggio di lourdes visse nella preghiera e nella penitenza allarrivo alla loro meta i pellegrini possono innanzitutto riposarsi e gustare anche lambiente che li circonda che non a caso scelto dal beato claudio rispecchia con lo sfondo dei colli circostanti delle nostre piccole dolomiti i monti lessini il noto lembo dei pirenei di francia e il tutto in mezzo a questo verde al contatto della natura alla luce e alla quiete luomo puo riscoprire se stesso in mezzo a questa bellissima vallata che in sintesi si puo definire con bellezza e fede che sono il volto e lanima di questo luogo sacro interessante il video santuario grotta di lourdes del beato claudio cache gemellata con grotta di lourdes 1 zimella cache gemellata con grotta di lourdes 2 brognoligo ftf brasola 06042015

ma jasnozolty kolor i wyrazny polysk nie utlenia sie w wodzie czy powietrzu chemicznie zloto nalezy do metali przejsciowych i pierwiastkow grupy 11 z wyjatkiem helowcow tzw gazow szlachetnych zloto wydobytego urobku jednak eksploatacja rud byla nieoplacalna sztolnia zostala wykuta recznie wzdluz okruszcowanych zyl kwarcowych w staropaleozoicznych lupkach i wulkanicznych diabazach pozyskiwanie northern tsenkher cave | khoid tsenkher cave khoit khoid tsenkheriin cave the longest cave of the mongol altai mountain chain the cave is formed in the limestone of the proterozoic period this cave is located 25 kilometers southwest of mankhan sum khovd province along the khoit tsenkher riverkhoit tsenkheriin cavehas two branches the main passage is 130m and 90m khoit tsenkher cave is famous rock paintings rock paintings of the khoit tsenkher cave date back to the upper palaeolithic period 2000015 000 years agothe detailed description of rock paintings in 1966 the mongolosoviet historical and cultural expedition under the direction of rosiiskogo the archeologist of professor apokladnikova in one of corners of the cave measuring 25 m high and 1520 m deep numerous symbols and animals were painted overlapping each other on the ceiling and wall lions elephants argali sheep ibexes ostriches antelopes camels as well as symbols were painted with mineralbased paints of rosy and brown colors on the walls deep inside the cave some particular parts of the animals such as their horns necks humps are depicted with an exaggerated hyperrealism typical of the palaeolothic period avirmede cave of mongolia ub2008p 99102 cache is traditional box with logbook pencil and some souveniers

umieszczaj odpowiedzi i foto spoilerow w swoim logu powodzenia en the bajka cave is a complex of three caves situated on western slope of the vistula valley near to small village gadecz this complex has got the status of inanimate natural monument caves have been formed in pleistocene due to flattening of sandstone layers and conglomerating of them by minerals the bajka cave is situated on steep forested slope of gorge the way to caves is not easy there is no visible trail slopes are very steep there is a stream on the bottom of gorge and you can also find lying trees on your road the bajka cave is a complex of three caves bajka i bajka ii and dziura z filarkiem you can visit just only the bajka i the length of interior of the cave is 19 meters the bajka ii is smaller because its length is 10 meters the deep of dziurka z filarkiem is only 15 meters so its also impossible to visit it brown and rusty spots can be observed on walls of sandstone caves its the effect of existence of unleashed iron compounds moreover intensive process of percolation occurs in sandstone caves because of porous structure of sandstone which can store a huge amount of water earthcache you will reach to coordinates only on foot the road to the cave is not easy take good tourist boots take a torch your tasks 1 you need a tape measure to answer on this question give approximate circuit of cave hole answers or photo spoilers in your log good luck
